Package org.digijava.module.help.action

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddGlossaryTopic
    Adds new glossary topic to db
    DeleteGlossaryTopic
    Deletes help topic.
    GetHelpBodyHtml
    Gets help topic body and returns as HTML.
    HelpActions  
    PdfExport  
    SaveTopicTitle
    Save new title of help or glossary topic.
    SearchGlossary
    Does search for glossary and return ajax results.
    ShowAddNewGlossary
    Renders add glossary page
    ShowGlossary
    Shows glossary page.
    ViewHelpTopics  
    WordExport  
    XlsExport
